channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: WATCH https://shorturl.at/kkg0A || #SalmanKhan Grooves To
item.description: WATCH https://shorturl.at/kkg0A || #SalmanKhan Grooves To Jalwa, Hugs Sonali Bendre

item.title: Mollywood #MeToo Storm I would like to say that we people in
item.description: Mollywood #MeToo Storm I would like to say that we people in the film industry are always looked upon with a magnifying glass. Sexual abuse against women, asking for sexual favours in return for some kind of work... happens on a day-to-day basis in every field, be it cinema, IT, politics, media...: Actor Khushbu Sundar speaks to Navika Kumar , Group Editor-In-Chief, Times Now & Times Now Navbharat

item.title: #ShaktiFightback | Four out of five rapists in the Nirbhaya
item.description: #ShaktiFightback | Four out of five rapists in the Nirbhaya case were hanged. Did that prevent this case (#KolkataHorror) from happening? No, it didn't. The primary problem is one of policing. You have not done police reforms. You don't want to separate investigation from political interference...: Abhijit Iyer Mitra, Senior Fellow, IPCS #TheNewshour | Navika Kumar
